meanings.definition: Plastiques: a type of explosive material
meanings.sent1: The soldiers carefully handled the plastiques during the bomb disposal operation.
meanings.sent2: The terrorists used plastiques to blow up the bridge.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy thief accidentally sat on the box of plastiques, causing a small explosion.
meanings.sent4: His anger was like plastiques, ready to explode at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The smell of plastiques filled the air, signaling danger.

meanings.definition: Plastiques: relating to or characteristic of plastic art or sculpture
meanings.sent1: The art gallery displayed beautiful plastiques sculptures made by local artists.
meanings.sent2: She admired the plastiques vase on the shelf, marveling at its intricate design.
meanings.sent3: The plastiques decorations in the garden glowed under the moonlight, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and colorful as a plastiques painting.
meanings.sent5: The plastiques statue in the park seemed to come to life in the sunlight.
